name: Art Class
description: You fall asleep in class and everyone draws on your face, including your teacher.

name: Doomed to Failure
description: Your classmates vote you "Most likely to fail."

name: Fire Drill
effect: This card counts as 2 Emotional Disasters.
description: The fire alarm rings as you are changing into your gym clothes, and you're forced to go outside in your underwear.

name: Say Cheese!
description: It's picture day, and you forgot how to smile.

name: You're Out
description: You get hit in the face with a dodgeball in front of your crush. You don't catch the ball.

name: Crabification
description: Your body hair is growing at an alarmingly accelerated rate. This doesn't seem normal.

name: Hot and Steamy
description: Your glasses fog up in while walking through the hot springs. You trip and fall into a geyser.

name: Oh Hail No
description: It's raining golf-ball sized hail, and you still have a 3-mile walk home.

name: Total Loss
effect: This card counts as 2 Natural Disasters.
description: You just got your first car, and a giant boulder falls on top of it.

name: Hungry Hungry Dinos
effect: This card counts as 2 Predatory Disasters.
description: You are sent away to boarding school with carnivorous dinosaurs. Good luck.

name: Pet Problems
description: Your pet velociraptor ate your homework, and no one will believe you.

name: Rabid Rabbit
description: A bunny bites you while you retrieve your ball from your neighbor's lawn. It might have rabies.

name: Raving Madness
description: You are about to enter your first concert ever! Yay! Unfortunately, a herd of bigger dinos tramples you before you walk through the entrance.

name: Super Murder Hornets
description: Your class goes on a field trip to the insectarium. Giant hornets attack you.
